Description: AVAILABLE 9/1. This penthouse apartment is priced right! Live in Boston's South End and stay in your budget. Enjoy a quiet, top floor apartment with lots of sunlight, a nice kitchen and bath and ample space. You're close to lots of great restaurants, cafes and night life. Easy walk to B.U. Med Center for students or employees. Rent includes heat and hot water. FIRST, SECURITY, and BROKER FEE REQUIRED. SORRY NO DOGS
